From: KSLawdogg@...

(Robo, that extreme of swearing is plain idiotic.  Don't do it again.  Just 
because JP's...opinion...differs, is not a reason to go cussing over the 
entire group.  Sending him a private e-mail would've worked nicely.  What JP 
said might not be all that right to some of you, but he's entitled to his 
opinion.

And this is a touchy subject, so I expect strongly worded e-mails, and I bet 
there'll be more e-mails with the same content as Robo's, but we don't need 
to see it in the RPG's messaging system.  If you have the urge to swear at JP 
in an idiotic and non-productive manner, e-mail him.  I personally don't want 
to see your stupid, swearing-filled comments.  And when I open it up, I don't 
enjoy having it stuck in my computer and the only way to get rid of it is to 
go in there and delete it.  I don't need that kind of useless e-mail piling 
in on the amount I have and receive.  So leave your moronic comments against 
JP in a private e-mail.


L. Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
